name: LivingEquipmentChangeEvent
description: LivingEquipmentChangeEvent is fired when the Equipment of a Entity changes. This event is fired whenever changes in Equipment are detected in EntityLivingBase.onUpdate() . This also includes entities joining the World, as well as being cloned. This event is fired on server-side only. slot contains the affected EntityEquipmentSlot . from contains the ItemStack that was equipped previously. to contains the ItemStack that is equipped now. This event is not Cancelable . This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS .
